name: prosper
description: [Link to the live application](https://www.prosper-media.cf/) ## Features: * User & Admin Authentication * Post related social media things:create,delete,update,report,comment,like * User follow,unfollow,report * User profile * Chart & Graph reports on Admin side * Form Validation * Post & users Management in Admin side * Accept/reject report in admin side * Twilio OTP login * Notification * Chat feature

scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'minor update' && git push prosper2 master
scripts.start: npm run socket && npm run server && npm run client
